bibl.title: Notice of the annual meeting of the Walter Reed Memorial Association, by Albert G. Love, November 7, 1952

div1.p: This notice specifies the time and place of the meeting and the business to be discussed.

div1.head: Notice of the annual meeting of the Walter Reed Memorial Association, by Albert G. Love, November 7, 1952
div1.p:
NOTICE of the ANNUAL MEETING
of
THE WALTER REED MEMORIAL ASSOCIATION

The annual meeting of the members of the Walter Reed Memorial
Association will be held in the Board Room, American Security and
Trust Company, 15th Street and Pennsylvania Avenue, Northwest, at
10:00 A.M. on Thursday, November 20, 1952, for the purpose of hearing
the reports of officers, electing directors to fill all vacancies,
electing officers for the ensuing year, and for the transaction of
any other business that may properly come before the meeting.
It is hoped that it may be possible for you to attend.
